com.github.katjahahn

Class PEModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.PEModule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    COFFFileHeader, MSDOSHeader, MSDOSLoadModule, OptionalHeader, PESignature, SectionTable

    public abstract class PEModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a common structure of a PE like certain headers or the section table
